sn55.6:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ karonti:
sn55.6:4.4: Tena kho pana samayena isidattapurāṇā thapatayo sādhuke paṭivasanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
sn55.6:5.1: Atha kho isidattapurāṇā thapatayo magge purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ:
sn55.6:5.2: “yadā tvaṃ, ambho purisa, passeyyāsi bhagavantaṃ āgacchantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ, atha amhākaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti.
sn55.6:5.3: Dvīhatīhaṃ ṭhito kho so puriso addasa bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn55.6:5.6: “ayaṃ so, bhante, bhagavā āgacchati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho.
sn55.6:6.1: Atha kho isidattapurāṇā thapatayo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn55.6:6.2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṃsu.
sn55.6:6.3: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.6:6.5: Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
sn55.6:6.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te isidattapurāṇā thapatayo bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn55.6:7.2: ‘sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṃ pakkamissatī’ti, hoti no tasmiṃ samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṃ:

sn55.6:17.1: “Tasmātiha, thapatayo, sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā.
sn55.6:17.3: “Atthi kho no, bhante, etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā”ti.
sn55.6:17.4: “Katamo pana vo, thapatayo, etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā”ti?
sn55.6:18.1: “Idha mayaṃ, bhante, yadā rājā pasenadi kosalo uyyānabhūmiṃ niyyātukāmo hoti, ye te rañño pasenadissa kosalassa nāgā opavayhā te kappetvā, yā tā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa pajāpatiyo piyā manāpā tā ekaṃ purato ekaṃ pacchato nisīdāpema.
sn55.6:18.2: Tāsaṃ kho pana, bhante, bhaginīnaṃ evarūpo gandho hoti, seyyathāpi nāma gandhakaraṇḍakassa tāvadeva vivariyamānassa, yathā taṃ rājakaññānaṃ gandhena vibhūsitānaṃ.
sn55.6:18.3: Tāsaṃ kho pana, bhante, bhaginīnaṃ evarūpo kāyasamphasso hoti, seyyathāpi nāma tūlapicuno vā kappāsapicuno vā, yathā taṃ rājakaññānaṃ sukhedhitānaṃ.
sn55.6:18.4: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhante, samaye nāgopi rakkhitabbo hoti, tāpi bhaginiyo rakkhitabbā honti, attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti.
sn55.6:18.5: Na kho pana mayaṃ, bhante, abhijānāma tāsu bhaginīsu pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetā.
sn55.6:18.6: Ayaṃ kho no, bhante, etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā”ti.
sn55.6:19.1: “Tasmātiha, thapatayo, sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā.
sn55.6:19.3: Catūhi kho, thapatayo, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.6:20.2: Idha, thapatayo, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.6:20.7: vigatamalamaccherena cetasā ajjhāgāraṃ vasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
sn55.6:20.8: Imehi kho, thapatayo, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.6:21.1: Tumhe kho, thapatayo, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatā—
sn55.6:21.6: yaṃ kho pana kiñci kule deyyadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ appaṭivibhattaṃ sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehi.
sn55.6:21.7: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, thapatayo, katividhā te kosalesu manussā ye tumhākaṃ samasamā, yadidaṃ—
